definitions.definition: Extremely sensitive or volatile ; easily disturbed to the point of becoming unstable ; requiring caution or tactfulness .
examples: It is an extremely touchy situation, with everybody's patience wearing thin.
He can be very touchy when you talk about his cat, so be as tactful as possible.

definitions.definition: Inclined to engage in physical touch .

main_definition: ( of a situation ) Extremely sensitive or volatile ; easily disturbed to the point of becoming unstable ; requiring caution or tactfulness .
secondary_definitions: ( of a person ) Easily offended , oversensitive .
( informal ) Inclined to engage in physical touch .
